content.question: In its posture and expression, Jean-Antoine Houdonâ€™s statue of George Washington references

choices.label: Etruscan temple statues, such as the sculpture of Apollo from Veii
Classical Greek statues, such as the Doryphoros (Spear Bearer)
medieval Romanesque sculpture, such as the reliquary of Sainte-Foy
Baroque religious sculpture, such as the Ecstasy of Saint Teresa

content.answer: Classical Greek statues, such as the Doryphoros (Spear Bearer)

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain the influence of a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) on other artistic production within or across cultures.
